Name: Aquarium Filter
Description: An Aquarium Filter for automatically cleaning Aquariums, periodically creating Fertilizer. Place adjacent to an Aquarium.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 鱼池过滤器，用于自动清洁鱼池，定期产生肥料。放置在生态鱼池附近。
